Bāeo Bare Glow

Brand: Baeo

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Squalane, Simmondsia Chinensis, Rosa Canina (Rosehip) Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Calendula Officinalis (Calendula) Flower Extract, Cananga Odorata (Ylang Ylang) Flower Oil.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
